column4: hi, how do i update the my ubuntu that i already have installed a newer version of java?
what version of java do you have now and how did you install it before?
im currently running 1.4.2. I just installed jdk1.5.0 by executing the .bin i downloaded manually
what ubotu just sent you is what cafuego said but it won't scroll off your screen, also /msg ubotu javadebs   , for already-made java .debs you can use
